objective: Enhance Webizen with performance optimizations, scalability tests, dependency management, accessibility (RTL support), user adoption features, community engagement, and multi-lingual support. Complete phases 5-12, including calendar, gitmark, settings, editor, i18n, and community modules, with SolidOS, semantic tokens (SLP/VCs), OAuth, and UI toolkits (pages-ui, work_ui).

global_rules.write_status: Append status to autonomous_build_status.json: {phase_id, prompt_id, status: 'completed' or 'failed', output_file, timestamp: '2025-07-13T00:48:00+10:00'}
global_rules.log_errors: If error, append to Autobot_errors.json: {phase_id, prompt_id, issue: 'Error description', llm_details: 'Model name, version', date: '2025-07-13T00:48:00+10:00'}

pre_task.task: Read autonomous_build_status.json to identify the next uncompleted task (first task with no status or 'failed'). If none, start with Phase 1, Prompt 1.
pre_task.suggested_improvements: Validate autonomous_build_status.json schema before reading to ensure data integrity; add JSON schema file.

prompts.task: Replace placeholder methods in modules/cashtab/index.js with @cashtab/wallet-lib for multi-sig wallets, eCash addresses, SLP tokens, ECDSA signatures. Add network failure handling and caching for wallet operations.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Implement batch processing for SLP token issuance to reduce network calls.

prompts.task: Update services/webizen-api.js for SPHINCS+/Ed25519/AES verification using sphincs, ed25519, CryptoJS. Add logging via services/logging.js and rate limiting for API endpoints.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Add API metrics dashboard for monitoring request rates.

prompts.task: Update services/quadstore.js to use quadstore, quadstore-comunica for persistent RDF storage, replacing in-memory placeholders. Add SolidOS pod support via @inrupt/solid-client and caching for query optimization.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Implement query indexing for large RDF datasets.

prompts.task: Update services/ipfs.js to integrate ipfs-http-client for agreements, backups storage. Add SolidOS pod backup support and IPFS pinning for critical data.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Add IPFS garbage collection to manage storage.

prompts.task: Replace Unix-style commands in package.json build scripts with rimraf, cpx for cross-platform compatibility. Ensure Electron build supports Node.js 22 LTS with electron-builder, electron-forge, and localized app packages.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Add build script for generating language-specific installers.

prompts.task: Enhance tests/integration/scalability.test.js to test Quadstore, SolidOS pods, Webizen API under 100ms network latency, and high-volume datasets (10,000+ records).
prompts.suggested_improvements: Simulate network failures for robustness testing.

prompts.task: Update services/webizen-api.js /health endpoint to check Quadstore, IPFS, WebTorrent, SolidOS availability, and add response time metrics.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Expose health metrics via Prometheus endpoint.

prompts.task: Implement services/logging.js to export logs to Quadstore, IPFS, SolidOS pods using services/quadstore.js, services/ipfs.js, @inrupt/solid-client, with log rotation.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Add log compression to reduce storage footprint.

prompts.task: Write E2E tests in tests/e2e/smoke.test.js for Webizen API workflows (module registration, resource loading, SolidOS pod access), including multi-lingual responses.
prompts.suggested_improvements: Add test coverage for API localization errors.
